name: Three Once
description:
Game submitted to the GMTK Jam 2019. Recommended to play on Fullscreen.

You can play with Keyboard or Controller. XBox Controller works fine, I don't know about others controllers.

Try to beat each level, but be careful: you can just jump, dash and shoot once per level, and touch each ground piece one time!

Game made by Delunado: https://www.twitter.com/Delunad0 | Follow my little indie studio Twitter! https://www.twitter.com/TEAteam_
